string-array.name: new_release_body
string-array.item: Users can provide data voluntarily to help improve the #OstaniZdrav app further and help experts evaluate its effectiveness. It is not possible to draw any conclusions about individual persons, so that the privacy of the users is protected.
Certificates can now be moved to the Trash when deleted, where they will remain stored for 30 days. During this time you can also restore them.

string-array.name: submission_done_further_info_bullet_points
string-array.item: The duration of isolation is at the discretion of your treating physician.
In case of worsening of the disease, consult your chosen personal or on-duty doctor by phone. In an emergency, call 112. Inform them that you have been diagnosed with SARS-CoV-2.
Exposure logging has stopped because you have been diagnosed with SARS-CoV-2 infection. When the isolation is finished, press the Reactivate button and the exposure log will be activated.

string-array.name: test_result_card_negative_further_info_bullet_points
string-array.item: Still feeling unwell? If you feel very poorly and/or your symptoms have worsened, please contact your general practitioner.
Remain at home until you feel well again. If you were to get infected with coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) whilst weakened from another infection, this could lead to a serious illness.
Do not go to work if you feel unwell to ensure you do not put other people at risk.
